activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11049
activity.text:
@Jacobjeevan below is my proposal for this issue. Please assign it if it looks good to you, and let me know if you have any comments or suggestions.

**Proposed Solution Description:**
I propose adding the `break-words` class to the `Popover` component to ensure consistent text wrapping across all popover instances. This will prevent text overflow by allowing long words to break and wrap within the popover container.

**Specific change:**
- Add `break-words` to the existing classes in the popover className.

**Expected Timeline:**
End date: 06-03-2025.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11057
activity.text:
@sj11105 

**Solution Description:**
I propose to modify the Zod validation schema in the `CreateScheduleTemplateSheet` component to prevent creating schedule templates with past dates. The solution involves:
- Adding date refinement for `valid_from` to allow today or future dates
- Adding date refinement for `valid_to` to allow strictly a future date.
- Implementing custom error messages for clear user feedback

**Expected Timeline:**
End date: 05-03-2025
